title: @ Riot, Stealth changes Question
body: Will the new stealth changes affect Shaco boxes and Teemo shrooms? Will there be oracles changes?

replies.body: Probably no changes that affect stealthed traps like Boxes/Shrooms. We're not planning to overhaul stealth as whole system, more to make tweaks to a few kits and detection methods.
Have you seen how they do it in Heroes? Just a shimmer. Is this something you guys ever considered? Or would that be a huge nerf to stealth eve / rengar/ twitch if you could see their blurry outlines

> [{quoted}](name=redfeenix,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pGuELGEK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-11T20:28:15.174+0000)
>
> Have you seen how they do it in Heroes? Just a shimmer. Is this something you guys ever considered? Or would that be a huge nerf to stealth eve / rengar/ twitch if you could see their blurry outlines

It would nerf them completely, as a Twitch main, and having played as and against all of those champions it would ruin them. Twitch as an adc is already shit because of pink wards, and having you be able to see him would just crush him.

So you mean red trinkets and pink wards will stay the same, but you're ALSO adding built-in detection methods for champions with stealth? 

That's pretty good, but I'm a disappointed you're not doing a proper holistic overhaul of the stealth system. It's pretty archaic and surely not as good and well designed as it could be. When, if ever, might we se a proper stealth rework, then?

Can you guys just not change stealth? Stealth is fine as is... Unless your gonna nerf is with better detection. That's fine. Honestly stealth in this game is the only stealth in any mobas that are actually good why ruin something that's fine .-.

Although I guess your company is notorious for that...

But why is stealth being changed?   There are several ways to prevent something like a Shaco popping you or a Rengar ulting you.  Buy a pink ward, stick to your team, don't position poorly, don't position poorly early game and avoid feeding the assassin.
